member.name: M:XMLReader.Functionalities.openCard(System.String)
member.summary: Opens a cardfile and parses its contents into cache.

member.name: M:XMLReader.Functionalities.saveCard(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the cache into an XML file and saves it.

member.name: M:XMLReader.Functionalities.newCard(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a new card at the specified location within the cardfile.
member.param: Current position of the card that is being viewed.

member.name: M:XMLReader.Functionalities.deleteCard(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete a card from the cardfile.
member.param: Number of the card to be deleted.
